current.custom_tab_content:
Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.

settings.content_tabs_1:
In our homes, art is the medium that speaks of our individual blueprint of beauty, but how to make great art accessible and affordable? This was the idea behind FINEPRINT co - a print range of limited edition artworks by major Australian artists and open edition archival photoprints from local and International masters of photography.

FINEPRINT co by Corporate Art is a one-stop image resource curated by leaders in their field - with over 10 years experience in creating and supplying quality artworks for designers, businesses and individuals. We believe everyone deserves beauty in their lives; FINE PRINT co wants to help you curate a beautiful life.
settings.content_tabs_2:
FINEPRINT co is an exciting new division of the Corporate Art brand providing a sophisticated collection of artwork from emerging and distinctive artists to clients worldwide.

After 30 years supplying inspired artwork for many large scale projects both nationally and internationally, we are pleased to offer a print range that has evolved from the relationships we have forged with designers and artists to bring innovative artwork to homes and projects.

The invaluable knowledge gained, the desire to share and create exceptional art, in conjunction with our vibrant in-house team of graphic designers and artists, has brought the FINEPRINT co print range to life.

settings.contact_content_content: Our consultation hours are Monday – Friday 8:30am to 5pm or by appointment. Feel free to contact us by calling +61 7 5576 8888 or visit our showroom today.

settings.footer_newsletter_title: SIGN Up for $50 off your first online order
settings.footer_newsletter_content: Sign up to the FINEPRINT co Newsletter for first look at new products, special deals, early access to sales, events and more!

settings.subtitlefaq: How long will it take for my order to arrive?
settings.contentfaq:
FINEPRINT co will always ship your framed art prints via a trusted Art Courier which can take up to fourteen (14) days depending on when the order was placed.

FINEPRINT co can arrange faster shipping from other couriers, however, this service does not offer insurance on any damages or lost products.

Unframed prints are sent via a rolled tube within five (5) days of the order being placed. These are generally sent via Australia post.

Prints associated with Getty Images Gallery (Slim Aarons) are printed in London by Getty Images. This can add an extra three (3) weeks to any estimated shipping times.

Click to read more about our shipping and returns policy here

settings.subtitlefaq: Why is the 'Add to Cart' button greyed out?
settings.contentfaq: There are a few instances where you may not be able to add items to your cart. This may occur if a variable is unavailable within a product. Example: You are wanting to purchase a Slim Aarons Canvas Print in a D size or smaller but the add to cart option is unavailable. This is because the smallest Slim Aarons Canvas print size we offer is E.

settings.subtitlefaq: What are the print material options?
settings.contentfaq:
Photo Matt Paper: 230 GSM
High White Satin Photographic Paper: 260 GSM
Hahnemuhle Rag Paper: 310 GSM, White, 100% a-cellulose inkjet paper that guarantees archival standards.
Satin Canvas: 310 GSM Polyester/Cotton, Natural Bright White.

Artist Editions: Available on Satin Photographic Paper, Hahnemuhle Rag Paper or Satin Canvas.
Open Editions: Available on Photo Matt Paper or Satin Canvas.
Snapper Media: Available on Satin Photographic Paper, Hahnemuhle Rag Paper or Satin Canvas.
Slim Aarons: Available on Satin Photographic Paper or Satin Canvas.

On the bottom left of the website we have the option to view our prices in AUD, USD, and NZD using the latest conversion rates.

Note that although you can view the cost you will check out and pay in AUD. Although this is generally not a problem some banks charge a small conversion fee on their end.

FINEPRINT co will always ship your framed art prints via a trusted Art Courier which can take up to fourteen (14) days depending on when the order was placed. FINEPRINT co can arrange faster shipping from other couriers, however, this service does not offer insurance on any damages or lost products.

Click to read more about our shipping and returns policy here

settings.subtitlefaq: Placing orders from outside of Australia and New Zealand?
settings.contentfaq: FINEPRINT co is FINEPRINT co is happy to ship rolled prints internationally. Unfortunately we do not offer shipping of framed prints internationally.

FINEPRINT co will offer returns on any framed or unframed prints damaged in transit where delivery has been arranged by us using our prefered art courier. If damage has occurred a return lodgement must be placed within three (3) days of delivery. To do this simply contact us via our contact page or email: digital@fineprintco.com with the order number and images of the damaged print. FINEPRINT co does not offer returns or refunds where the client has asked for special delivery via a non-art-courier. Please choose carefully as we do not operate a refund or exchange policy for “Change of Mind" Returns.

Click to read more about our shipping and returns policy here

settings.subtitlefaq: What measurement are your sizes in?
settings.contentfaq: All of our sizes are in millimetre.

settings.subtitlefaq_page: If you have any questions that are not available below please email digital@fineprintco.com and we will get back to you within 24 hours.

settings.block_icon_subtitle_1: FINEPRINT co is the Exclusive Agent in Australia and New Zealand for Getty Images Gallery.
Our in-house printing ensures minimal lead time and prompt turn-a-round on our client’s orders.
Our in-house master framers can produce bespoke framing solutions to suit all our clients individual requirements.

Default.custom_tab_content:
Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.
